effect.sun_moon: Heals the user for half its max HP. If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the user for half its max HP. If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the user for half its max HP. If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.

short_effect.sun_moon: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
